titleStmt.title: The true history of the ciuill vvarres of France, betweene the French King Henry the 4. and the Leaguers Gathered from the yere of our Lord 1585. vntill this present October. 1591. By Antony Colynet.
titleStmt.author: Colynet, Antony.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Orwin] for Thomas Woodcock, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tragicall historie of the ciuill warres of France.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the black Beare
